title: Indiana Firm Recalls Barbecue Beef, Pork and Chicken Products Due To Mislabeling and an Undeclared Allergen
summary: WASHINGTON, May 6, 2011 - Butterfield Foods, a Noblesville, Ind., establishment is recalling approximately 285,100 pounds of barbecue beef, pork and chicken products because they contain an undeclared allergen, soy, which is not declared on the label. The products subject to recall include: Two five...
impacted_products: Two five lb. cases (Net Wt. 10 lbs.) of "BUTTERFIELD FOODS TEXAS STYLE BBQ SAUCE WITH PORK" with a case code of "05002205."
